title: Bought TSM Icon/Emote bundle but didn't get Emote
body:
My IGN: Hesed

I bought the TSM Icon/Emote bundle for 450 RP but I only have the Icon. The only emote in my collection is thumbs up. I've seen other people have the emote. I bought this for the emote. What's going on here?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Hesed,realm=OCE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=78XdAeyd,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-09-19T21:13:30.483+0000)
>
> My IGN: Hesed
> 
> I bought the TSM Icon/Emote bundle for 450 RP but I only have the Icon. The only emote in my collection is thumbs up. I&#039;ve seen other people have the emote. I bought this for the emote. What&#039;s going on here?


Then later you say you want the C9 emote. Something seems fishy.
Yooooo....those were two different people here buddy xD. Check the summoner names of the person who posted it and the person I was replying to.
I believe those Esports Emotes are the kind that replaces the mastery emotes and not actually one of the new kind of emotes.
even if this was the case it actually showed my mastery instead of the team emote
Did you have the icon equipped at the time?

Ahhhhh I just noticed you were on OCE! OCE already has the new emote system setup I believe, so you'll need to setup those emotes in the profile section I think. I don't have emotes here on NA yet, so I won't be able to take any screenshots of where to do it sadly, but it should be next to your Collections I believe!

https://imgur.com/a/baBU0

I understand that we have the emote system but the emote inventory only contains the default thumbs up icon. When I bought the bundle only the icon appeared and I just assumed that the emote would be applied, but it seems to have disappeared if it was meant to show up in my emote inventory/collection/loot
Hmmmm yea it looks like the emote wasn't ever added to your account for some reason. Go ahead and close and reopen the client for me, and let me know if you see it now.
LOL awkward i got a tsm emote instead of a c9 one.. can i have my c9 one please? (or can i have both? :o)
Aaaaaawkwaaaaard. I've adjusted that so that you have the C9 one now xD!

I bought a 2017 icon for ssg yesterday, but it's not appearing in my inventory. 
IGN: Zumbiemaru
